name: Wenwen Dou
content: Wenwen Dou - Associate Professor at UNC Charlotte Advancing Science at the intersection of Visual Analytics and AI Associate Professor at UNC Charlotte specializing in visual analytics, AI/text mining, social media analysis, and leadership science. Explore My Research Featured Projects Leadership Science Applying AI and visualization techniques to study leadership signals and effectiveness. VAiRoma A visual analytics system for exploring Roman history based on textual data. DemographicViz Analyzing demographic information from social media data. ParallelTopics Visually exploring large text collections using topic hierarchies. Interested in Collaboration? I'm always open to new research opportunities and collaborations. Get in Touch
